{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Shards |image = [[File:Red_Shard.png|90px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Red Shard''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] }} ==Description== '''Shards''' are items you can mine from the [[Underground]], obtain from Daily Deals, find as [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] loot, or trade for with the Hoenn [[Berry Master]]. They can then be used, together with [[Quest Points]] {{Questpoints}}, to purchase items at [[Shard Trader|Shard Traders]] or purchase the Furfrou (Star) at Parfum Palace in Kalos. ===Types=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" ! Shard Name !! Image !! Shard Name !! Image !! Shard Name !!
